name: The World Ends In 180 Seconds!
description:
Can you figure out how to stop it? Explore, investigate, make some friends and piece the world together in order to save it before it all ends in this rapid puzzle-adventure game. Game made by Tobias Henriksson

Graphic assets made by itch.io user o-lobster

Additional assets made by Tobias Henriksson

Music made by freesound.org user joshuaempyre

Additional sounds made by Tobias Henriksson
